Title: AN ACT TO GRANT MELECIO MARQUEZ AN EXTENSION OF ONE HUNDRED DAYS OF THE TIME GRANTED HIM FOR ACCEPTING THE CONDITIONS OF THE FRANCHISE CONTRACT AWARDED TO HIM BY ACT NUMBERED FORTY-ONE HUNDRED AND THIRTY-SEVEN.
Data:
[ Acts No. 4267, November 07, 1935 ]
AN ACT TO GRANT MELECIO MARQUEZ AN EXTENSION OF ONE HUNDRED DAYS OF THE TIME GRANTED HIM FOR ACCEPTING THE CONDITIONS OF THE FRANCHISE CONTRACT AWARDED TO HIM BY ACT NUMBERED FORTY-ONE HUNDRED AND THIRTY-SEVEN.
Be it enacted by the Senate and House of Representatives of the Philippines in Legislature assembled and by the authority of the same:
Section 1. Melecio Marquez is hereby granted an extension of one hundred days of the time granted him for accepting the conditions of the franchise contract awarded to him by Act Numbered Forty-one hundred and thirty-seven: Provided, That the franchise shall be understood to be for only twenty-five years and shall not be transferable except with the approval of the Philippine Legislature.1a—àphi1
Section 2. This Act shall take effect on its approval.
Approved, November 7, 1935.
